import React ,{Component} from 'react' import Title from '../Title'; import CartColumns from '../CartColumns'; import CartItem from './CartItem'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; export default function CartTotals({value}){ const {cartSubtotal,cartTax,cartTotal,clearCart} = value; return(
SubTotal :$ {cartSubtotal}
Tax :$ {cartTax}
Total :$ {cartTotal}
 ) }
